commit message: Only sync plays if set in the settings. Fix incorrect log message for oldest buddies.
Add missing fields to collection table (and correct some existing ones). Parse the collection correctly and fully. Add a new sync task to sync the collection of a specific game.
Update the collection properly to prevent all of the data from being deleted
Create the new columns in the Collection table - the last commit didn't upgrade the DB correctly
Add option to turn off the syncing of polls; move the help methods to HelpUtils
Add option to display notifications when there are errors insert poll information

Update version number and release notes
Make the error notification option dependent on polls being synced
